Project Description: Create a program that asks the user to input various adjectives
column5: and then creates a story out of them.

Project Description: Create a calculator capable of executing basic mathematical operations.
Create a program that plays rock-paper-scissors with the user.
Create a program that countsdown from a user-inputted time.
Create a program that randomly selects a number within a user-specified range. The user will then try to guess the number with unlimited tries.
Bubble sort is a basic sorting algorithm that all programmers should know. It essentially sorts a list of values in ascending or descending order by continuously swapping values.
Create a quiz program where the user will answer a list of questions and the program will output if the user is correct or incorrect along with their total score.
Create a program that outputs story-like descriptions and asks the user to create their own story by choosing various plotlines.
